model.interfaces
Interface IGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

Type Parameters:
NodeType - the class of a node in a graph
All Known Subinterfaces:
IModifiableGraph<NodeType>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Graph, PartitionGraph
public interface IGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

This is the interface all graphs have to provide. The interface has no methods to modify the graph.

Author:
sigurd
